name: MECHanical
description:
Survive against the hordes of evil membrain! armed with a mech and your keyboard, you must do what you can to save humanity!

Rack up kills to power your abilities to help you fight the mobs!

In the year 20XX, 99% of adults on Earth suddenly fell into a deep slumber. With no adults, the world descended into chaos. A team of children is left to defend the Earth against the alien life form known as the Membrain.

 They are the MECHanicals.

Game and Art made by: Adil (Dil) 

Music by: Azure Resonance

Playtesters & Believers: Alex, Ally, Amelia, Cal, Kalynn, Mari.

2022 ANIME EXPO CHIBI GAME JAM!
